body.name: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside, 1080P Dash Camera for Cars, Dashcam Three Way Triple Car Camera with 32GB SD Card, IR Night Vision, Loop Recording, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor, 24h Recording
features: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside: Flyneei dash cam front and rear comes with three lenses, 170° wide-angle front camera, 120° cab camera, 150° rear camera, the dashcam simultaneously records important segments in three different directions as valid evidence for disputes or accidents.

1080P Dash Camera for Cars with IPS Screen: The car camera has 6-glass lens plus & F1.8 super aperture. The HD IPS display is equipped with Sony sensors and NTK chips, which can play smooth HD resolution 1920x1080/30 fps video content through the car camera screen.

Super Night Vision & G-sensor: the dashcam's cab lens has 4 built-in infrared lights and 4 LED lights on the rear lens, ensuring that you can complete the driving record even at night. If the car dashboard cam crashes after parking, it automatically turns on and records video for about 30 s. Front and rear dash camera is ideal for rideshare drivers such as Uber, Lyft, and Taxi.

Loop Recording & 24H Recording: Dashcam is equipped with a 32GB memory card, which can loop and automatically delete the full video of the card. Camera for car supports 24H video recording (NOTE: requires additional purchase of a hardware kit).
Easy Install & Guaranteed: Car camera - dash cam front and rear compact body is easy to install, does not obstruct the line of sight, and is safe to drive. Flyneei offers a 24/7 mail service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 24 Hours Parking Motion When people leave the car, the recorder supports 24-hour parking monitoring to prevent your car from malicious damage, theft, scratches, etc. (NOTE: Need hardwire kit， extra purchase on Amazon) Intelligent Gravity Sensor In the event of a collision, the documents recorded by the dash cams will be locked, and will not be deleted even in the case of loop recording, which will provide you with valid and important documents to hand over to the police or court. Super IR Night Vision & LED Lights The cab's interior camera has Ultra-high-definition 6-wave lens, 4 infrared night vision lamp beads in the cab + 4 LED lights for the rear camera, so that you can record very clearly even when driving at night in complete darkness.

Rear Camera with Waterproof & LED Lights The rear camera is waterproof, so it can still clearly record the oncoming car behind when traveling in rainy weather, and when reversing at night, it can provide accurate parking lines and bright illumination. Loop Recording The dashcam is divided into: 1/3/5 minutes for each file, you can set the duration of the file according to your needs, when the memory card is full, it will cycle to overwrite the old file and record again, without manually deleting the document. Free 32GB SD Card Just format the memory card on the computer or dashcam before use, it will automatically record after plugging in the car camera, and when you encounter freezing or other minor problems, you can use the needle to insert the reset hole to reset.
Our page has detailed installation videos and usage videos to help you through the installation process and learn how to use it, 7/24 hour mail service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor picture, narrow-angle cabin and rear cameras
reviews.reviewText: This Flyneei F10 3-channel dashcam is pretty poor. The front camera is quite poor in daytime and night. The cabin and rear cameras have a narrow field of view so don't capture much.The front camera has a decent wide-angle view and would capture wrecks in the front and who was at fault, but little more. License plates are only readable when right in front or to the side, otherwise they're blurry. Even street signs are hard to read until they're right next to you. This is very poor performance for a 1080p camera. Taking a photo in the camera at maximum resolution it's clear the camera is not 1080p, probably 720p.Night time performance is also poor, though it does pick up low light decently, and you can see the street under just streetlights or headlights. As with daytime, it would capture another vehicle impacting you in the front. License plates are unreadable even if right behind the vehicle (due to over-exposure). Blurriness seems even worse due to halos around bright things. There is no wide dynamic range.The mic pickup is decent, in case you need to verbally read out a plate or make a comment.The interior camera has such a narrow field it doesn't capture much of anything. The windshield mount doesn't even allow turning the camera enough to capture the driver's face, and of the back seat it only shows the center bit between the front seats. Its night vision is good, capturing things in pitch dark.The rear camera's field of view is also narrow, so it would only capture a small field of things happening right behind the car. It might still help determine fault if someone rear-ended you, though.Video is stored in an archaic MJPG encoding (AVI file), which gives poor quality for the space used. This limits how far back you can go in recordings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The durability of the dashcam is phenomenal. Great quality images. Captures everything. Easy installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Low quality; instructions are laughable.
reviews.reviewText: This is a very low quality camera and not well made. I struggled to fit the camera into the mounting piece because the jigsaw portion that should have slid one piece into the other was slightly mismatched. I have had to intuit how to work the device as the English version of the instructions look like they have gone through multiple levels of translation. This is not the dash cam I would steer my friends toward—spend a bit more for something higher quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ALMOST A FULL 360 DEGREES OF RECORDING
reviews.reviewText: Straight forward installation. Good value for a good price. I feel safer knowing that everything that happens in the front, rear and inside my vehicle is being recorded. All 3 cameras have a wide panoramic view in all directions that gives you almost a full 360 degrees view. So you can capture everything going on all around you including the sidewalk. You can set the screen to split the view to show all 3 cameras on the screen at the same time or set it to show 2 views or just 1 camera view.I took away 1 star because you have to buy the additional hardwire kit to use the 24hr. motion detector car monitoring function and the manufacturers suggested you only use a 32gb memory card for the best performance of this dash cam and I would prefer to have more memory capability in case I need to go back and see what happened last week. However, the recorder will automatically loop and record over old footage when the 32gb is full. OVERALL I AM HAPPY WITH THIS ITEM.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great resolution
reviews.reviewText: OK, this was a free product via Amazon Vine. Biggest issue I had, that would make me consider other options, is the difficulty making out license plates, especially at night. The purpose of the camera is to record a traffic incident, if the other party speeds away and you aren't really able to get the license plate, that's a bit of a problem. I don't have another similar camera to test it against, but this max'es out at 1080p, I would lean towards something higher-res.There are 3 cameras, however the one facing you is fixed, you will not be in frame unless you turn the entire device towards you. I preferred to have it sit on the other side of the rear-view mirror, to avoid distracting me while driving, but that mean the reverse camera only saw an empty seat. Personally I never tried the 3rd camera, didn't want to fuss with all the wires hanging in my car.To be fair, if you insist on a 3-camera setup, this package makes that possible at an affordable price. Won't be the best quality but it works. Also the camera is very very light, no problem with any suction or dropping from the mount.I fully understand that high-quality cams might cost double, even triple of this item, however it seems like an investment that is worth it. If you get in a traffic accident, you are potentially facing thousands, or even tens of thousands, of dollars in liability, replacement, investigation and injury costs. You will want the maximum proof of exactly what happened and who's fault it was, at that point I think you'd wish you had spent an extra $100 to get a better-quality camera with more detail and definition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool Dash cam, right price
reviews.reviewText: Out of the dash cams out there, this is one of the nicer ones. It has all three channels. That means in front of the car, inside the car, and behind the car. It comes in the box with everything you need to install it. Installation is a breeze, the hardest part is hooking up the rear view camera, and even that is simple. Once it's installed, it is ready to go with very little setup. It has all the same options as most dash cams, including parking monitor, and g sensor, which are the two most important probably. The camera Works great, picture is clear and easy to see. It saves to the SD card automatically in case you need the tape for evidence. Overall it's a great device for the price, highly recommended.
